channel.title: How can i make red portal pvp
channel.description: ilooked up a guide already but i get one error but if somebody could tell me how i can make my red portal area pvp i would appreciate it very much

item.title: How can i make red portal pvp
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

c.checkWildy() or something like that. if its a pi.
if not just find the method that knows if your in wildy or not.
add your “coordinate plane” to that area.

personally, i would use isWildy(), isPVP(), isSafePVP() though would have to write them yourself.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make red portal pvp
